projects.name: Checklatey
projects.description: like Ninite, for the Chocolatey package manager for Windows. a simple checklist of apps you might want to install on a fresh PC

projects.name: Bitwits
projects.description: a free and fun party game of head-to-head wits. built using React and Node.js, especially socket.io

projects.name: Forgot My Slides
projects.description: a random powerpoint generator that pulls image and text from a variety of sources. great for powerpoint karaoke, or in a pinch, board meetings

projects.name: Powerrank.io
projects.description: my first database-through-SPA full stack app. A site that lets you rank things, your friend rank things, and everybody find the one true ranking of things

projects.name: Inspopaper
projects.description: a Slack bot written in Python that turns any message into an inspirational wallpaper. no longer online, this was very much a lessons learned project
